author: ruffstuff
content:
The Preve now, all variant comes with ESC, and 6 airbags as standard.  With slight price decrease.  Yes, Proton priority now is safety.  Their investment in HPF plant is worth it imho.  The only plant with HPF tech in ASEAN, and 6th in the world.  Even honda, mercedes, mazda request HPF parts from Proton plant for high end models.  

The FLX Asean NCAP case is due to the organization pick the lowest end, and the model already EOL and which proton already updated with FLX+ which scored 3 star Asean NCAP.
